diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+FROM ubuntu:14.04
+
+MAINTAINER Jan Prach <jendap@google.com>
+
+# Copy and run the install scripts.
+COPY install/*.sh /install/
+RUN /install/install_bootstrap_deb_packages.sh
+RUN add-apt-repository -y ppa:openjdk-r/ppa && \
+    add-apt-repository -y ppa:george-edison55/cmake-3.x
+RUN /install/install_deb_packages.sh
+RUN /install/install_pip_packages.sh
+RUN /install/install_bazel.sh
+RUN /install/install_proto3.sh
+RUN /install/install_buildifier.sh
+RUN /install/install_auditwheel.sh
+RUN /install/install_golang.sh
body: Good question! I'm keeping these in sync with the main Dockerfile.cpu, but I've added a comment to explain why all the dependencies are needed. Let me know if this makes sense.
